Text:
I can't open the HTML files.  How big a magnet do I need?  Square or round?  Do I run the magnet across the disk just on the top or also across the bottom?  Gee, this doesn't seem right, but I'll try it anyway.  heh.

Thanks for the up.

I do not understand the hard drive treatment you describe. may i use this solution for other files that do not work. i have heard there are large magnets at military bases can i borrow them. i do not know about the "html" but i would to like to watch this saucy and perky romance set in topeka.

thankee-sai
